statements: DELETE FROM driver_profiles WHERE age > 30 AND preferred_temperature < 25.0;
DELETE FROM driver_profiles WHERE driver_id = 1 AND age > 30;
DELETE FROM driver_profiles WHERE preferred_temperature BETWEEN 20.5 AND 25.0;
DELETE FROM preferences WHERE driver_id IN (SELECT driver_id FROM drivers WHERE email LIKE '%gmail.com');
DELETE FROM Cars WHERE car_year < 2010 AND car_color = 'Blue';
DELETE FROM notification_history WHERE driver_id = 1001 AND EXTRACT(YEAR FROM notification_date) < 2021
DELETE FROM music_playlist WHERE songs_count > 100 AND duration_minutes > 60
